original_text: Moreover, I saw under the sun that in the place of justice, even there was wickedness, and in the place of righteousness, even there was wickedness.
korean_text: 또 내가 해 아래에서 보건대 재판하는 곳 거기에도 악이 있고 정의를 행하는 곳 거기에도 악이 있도다

sentences.original_text: Moreover, I saw under the sun
that in the place of justice, even there was wickedness
and in the place of righteousness, even there was wickedness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 의가 있는 곳에서도 사악함이 있었다
